fields.name: Brillance
fields.effect: For one week, the user's cells are coated with a protective veneer that resists damage (+1 à l'Armure, or +2 à l'Armure if the cypher is level 5 or higher) and eases Défense de Puissance rolls by two steps. However, healing is more difficult during this time; all recovery rolls suffer a —1 penalty.
